name: BREAK A LEG (itch) (chritaq)
description:
*This game is reccomended to play with an Xbox Controller

Description:

A two-player soccer game where your legs "explode" when you kick the ball. Made during the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "Only one", which we used to make a game where your legs are one use only.

Controllers:

Xbox Controller
LS: Move character
X: Kick Ball/Fire Leg

Keyboard
P1: WASD, Space
P2: Arrow-Keys, Return

Credits:
Anton Lindqvist (Programming, Design)
Filip Nilsson (Programming)
Simon Ektjärn (Programming)
Marcus Holst (Graphics)
Christopher Tåqvist (Music)
